name: Summer Lunch Program
short_desc: Provides year-round drop-in meal service at various sites for Oakland youth, age 1-18
description: Summer Food Service Program sites are located throughout Oakland, providing summer drop-in meal service for Oakland youth, age 1-18. Meals provided Monday-Friday, at various sites such as churches and community and recreation centers throughout Oakland.For a current listing of the Summer Food Service Program, call 510-444-2489 or check the website at http://www2.oaklandnet.com/Government/o/DHS/s/YouthYoungAdults/index.htm, or call the Alameda County Community Food Bank, 800-870-3663.
